price_single.description: Net price of a single entry. If a product id is given, price_single is taken from the product if not set.

net_total.description: Net price of a single entry. Calculated from price_single * quantity

date.description: Date of the entry. Defaults to today. Entries are sorted by date per default.

billable.description: True if the entry should appear on invoices.

billed_at.description: Date the object was billed. Is set when the entry is used on an invoice

created_at.description: Date the object was created in SK. Never changes afterwards

updated_at.description: Date the object was edited in SK.

_destroy.description: When set an existing entry will be deleted. This switch is used for entries passed during batch operations.

page.title: Page
page.description: In paginated results set the page to look for

per_page.title: Per page
per_page.description: Results per page. Default is 10, max is 100

filter[date_from].title: From date
filter[date_from].description: Objects with a date eq/after the date. YYYY-MM-DD

filter[date_to].title: To date
filter[date_to].description: Objects with date eq/before the date. YYYY-MM-DD

filter[created_at_from].title: From creation date
filter[created_at_from].description: Objects with a date eq/after the date. YYYY-MM-DD

filter[created_at_to].title: To creation date
filter[created_at_to].description: Objects with a creation until the date(<=). ISO 8601 format YYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss+z or just a date YYY-MM-DD. If date is given the time is set to the end of the day(23:59:59) so all objects created on that day are included. A time should be already utc time.

sort_by.title: Sort by
sort_by.description: Sort the results by the given field => number

sort.title: Sort
sort.description: Sort the results in ASC or DESC
